description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMaster of Concoctions:
If all the creatures in your party are {RACE_Concoction}s, they have a 50% chance to {ACTION_attack} each enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_DISARMED} at the start of their turns. This trait does not stack.
name: Sigil of the Concoction
